TopicTitle: "Reply with Quote" not working at the moment

Articles.Content:
Sorry if this isn't the right place to post this, I wasn't sure where I should put forum-related bugs.

For some reason (as the title suggests) I can't seem to reply to people in threads with quotation. I get a little loading sign and it just keeps trying to load. Regular replies and regular posts seem to work just fine. I've tried on Chrome and Firefox (with Windows 7, if that matters) but the issue is on both of those. I actually tried to initiate a reply, then went gaming for about a half hour. When I came back it was still trying to load the reply.

Anyone else getting this?
Try opening the "Reply With Quote" in a new tab, that way it will work. The link itself isn't broken but for some reason it doesn't function properly with a regular left click.
I've been getting this same issue. I discovered that double-clicking it will "go advanced" with the quote.

Both those tricks worked, thanks a bunch!

EDIT:

Is the forum going through an overhaul of some sort? It seems the rep button has been moved (or removed even), or maybe I'm just blind.

We had a forum upgrade, it did not go well and all AJAX functions are turned off right now.

AJAX is what allows the page to change after it's displayed, like the reply box that appears between posts.

Additionally this belongs in "The Forum Forum" where there is already a post about this http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/48346-Reply-with-quote-stopped-working-Hangs-forever
